name: Hotel Mario Remastered
description:
Only for Beta Testing

-Mario

Up - Close/Open Doors/Go into Elevator

Down - Crouch

Z - Jump

X - Hide in Door

-Luigi

W - Close/Open Doors/Go into Elevator

S - Crouch

I - Jump

O - Hide in Door

C - Win Level

Fun Fact: Go to Sound Test, and type in a certain rhythm game abbreviation.

Fun Fact 2: On the Tite Screen, click on Mario.
